content.p: In each of the following, determine if the described cancellations are correct. If there are errors, find and explain any mistakes.

item.p:
\displaystyle \frac{ {{A}} + {{B}} }{ {{A}} }:
Cancel the {{A}} in the numerator and denominator to get \displaystyle \frac{ {{A}} + {{B}} }{ {{A}} } = {{B}}.

\displaystyle \frac{ {{A}} + {{B}} }{ {{A}} } :
Cancel the {{A}} in the numerator and denominator to get \displaystyle \frac{ {{A}} + {{B}} }{ {{A}} } = 1 + {{B}} .

\displaystyle \frac{ {{A}} + {{B}} }{ ({{A}})^{{d}} } :
Cancel one factor of {{A}} in the numerator and denominator to get \displaystyle \frac{ {{A}} + {{B}} }{ ({{A}})^{{d}} } = \frac{1 + {{B}}}{ ({{A}})^{ {{dd}} } } .

outtro.p: Explain why all items are incorrect.
